description: This file is the main entry point for a React front-end application. It imports React, ReactDOM, CSS styles, and the main App component. It initializes the React rendering by creating a root and rendering the App component within React.StrictMode.

methods.name: createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root for rendering into the specified DOM element.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Renders the React component tree into the root.
